body:
Pictures:

http://imgur.com/a/2bDHb

Download Link:

https://www.mediafire.com/?inu83ttv9vuchxa

Most of the textures are not created by me and I do not take any credit for them whatsoever. I just made all my edits to Plast Pack, not default pack. I also deleted some textures in Plast Pack that I disliked, such as the wheat/beds. Creds to:

Plast Pack, Preto Pack, Ozian Pack, Hotdog Craft, Maxinoxo, Kaki Pack, Sorlite's Pack, Bibitor, 0FPS Pack, Nikinok's pack, Black and White Pack. I may have forgot some.

There's a changelog, CUSTOM PLANKS, low fire / fullbright / clear water in the pack. Any feedback is appreciated! :D

title: Plast Edit - Jongh Pack [16x]

replies.body:
Jongh I have a small list on things you should change for the next update:

Spiders - They are white and their faces are black please change

Iron Swords - They look more like spears =, me and rilo both agree on this.

Gui - This isn't that big but I think you should be able to see the spaces. You can use the pack I told you.

Noteblock Particles - Just to simple

On a good note this is a great texture pack and I could never do anything like this!!

replies.body:
I made the edits requested by _TinyBear - here's the new pack: https://www.mediafire.com/?b60jd3qy8ck39aj

I just changed the spiders back to black, changed the iron sword, and changed the widgets(inventory bar) to one that looks cleaner. Also updated the pack picture.
